page.title: 03HOME LIFE
page.content: UNTIL ABOUT 50 YEARS AGO OUR BLOCK WAS FARMLAND ON THE EDGE OF BIRMINGHAM WITH A COUPLE OF SMALL VILLAGES AND A FEW FARM HOUSES IN THE 1930'S A NEW MAIN ROAD WAS BUILT AND A NEW HOUSING ESTATE IN PYPE HAYES. OTHER HOUSES WERE BUILT PRIVATELY ALONG 2 OTHER MAIN ROADS.THE NEXT BIG ESTATE WAS BUILT IN THE 1960'S.NOW,TO GET TO THE COUNTRYSIDE WE HAVE TO GO SEVERAL MILES ALL HOUSES NOW HAVE INSIDE BATHROOMS AND TOILETS AND AT LEAST 2 BEDROOMS. SOME OF THE COUNCIL HOUSES ARE BEING BOUGHT BY THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN THEM. MANY OF THE HOUSES LOOK ALL THE SAME WITH JUST A FEW LITTLE DIFFERENCES. IN THE HOUSES MOST PEOPLE HAVE T.V. FRIDGES,AND VIDEOS.THE ROADS ARE A BIT NARROW SO SOME PEOPLE WHO DO NOT HAVE GARAGES HAVE TROUBLE PARKING THEIR CARS.
